snippet: During a public debate on gambling, one of India’s top law enforcement officials remarked that arguing to legalize betting is “like saying if you can’t prevent rape, enjoy it.”
abstract: India's senior law enforcement official Ranjit Sinha draws criticism for making offhand reference to rape.
lead_paragraph: During a public debate on gambling, one of India’s top law enforcement officials remarked that arguing to legalize betting is “like saying if you can’t prevent rape, enjoy it.”

headline.main: India: Official Criticized for a Reference to Rape
headline.print_headline: India: Official Criticized for a Reference to Rape
